name: Third Wheeler
description:
Third Wheeler is a 2.5 three player platformer game where you are to make one of the other players your partner by shooting hearts of your assigned flag representing a part of the queer community! Once you get your partner you must run away from the Third Wheeler who will try to split the happy couple up!

This game was made in less than 48 hours by :

Facundo Calderon - Pixel Artist and Designer

Sean Simon - Programmer and Designer

Audio by: Strange Band Audio 

Jody Toomey: Music and Sound Design
